###4.15
Structure Browser
The Structure Browser displays the structure for a given expression and lets you dereference pointers.
Select "Structure Browser" from the Views menu to bring up the Structure Browser window.
Type jello_conec in the Expression field.
jello_conec
Sorry you must enter jello_conec.
You are now viewing the jello_conec structure.
Click on the bottom right arrow to continue.


Array Browser
Call Stack
Disassembly View
Exception View
Execution View
Expression View
File Browser
Memory View
Process Meter
Register View
Signal Panel
Source View
Structure Browser  
Syscall Panel
